value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Ungh...$k$pThat smell... The censer...
Did it actually work?$k$p$EFace|Wh-what happened?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Mmm... Good morning, everyone!
I feel incredibly well rested... What
a great nap!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My most sincere apologies for falling
asleep while on duty. As commander,
I should do better...$k$pIs everyone all right?
Are we all here?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|By the state of the Redolent Censer,
I would say we were asleep only for
a brief moment...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well, that's some relief. It felt like
I was dreaming for a long time, but...
I can't really remember what about.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Me too! I feel like I dreamt a grand
adventure... But I can't remember
any of it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|That somehow reminds me... Where
is $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|...What? Are you still waking up,
Alfonse? I don't think we know any
$Nu... Do we?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This is no time for jokes, Sharena.$k$pEveryone here has spent many
a long hour on the battlefield
with $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Are you confusing dream with
reality, Alfonse?$k$pThe summoner of legend was called
$Nu, right?$k$pThose stories are so old, there's no
way those people are still around.
It MUST have been a dream...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Anything is possible, though! If once
a summoner came from another
world, I'm sure it could happen again.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$pYou two aren't being serious,
are you?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why would we joke about this?
...Are you sure you're all right,
Alfonse? Honestly?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It could be that the censer gave you
some sort of strange dream...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|No. I refuse to believe that...$k$pBut...if no one else remembers...
Could it be that my dream was so
vivid, I confused it for my waking life?$k$pNo, that can't be it... After all the
time we've spent fighting side by
side with $Nu...$k$pWhat in Askr's name is going on?!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Enemy forces! Prepare for battle!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Th-that's—$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Ha-ha-ha-hah!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I-it can't be!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Has it been so long that you've
forgotten your place before me,
weaklings? Your place is to bow.$k$pFor I am Surtr, your king. And you
will praise my name.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|N-no! Not after everything we went
through to defeat him!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If Surtr's truly back, then...could
everyone else also be—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Argh! Think, Alfonse... How could
this be possible? And how can I make
everything normal again?!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|He's... Surtr's gone...
This is just like...$k$pI remember now... The nightmares
that lived in our dreams... Zacharias
and the others all vanished as well...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Are you still with us, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes. I'm fine. It's just...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Here, now, in this Askr, something...
beyond rational understanding is
taking place.$k$pIt is as if reality itself has been
twisted by nightmare...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|A report has just come in! It seems
people throughout the wheat country
village have started waking.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Was it because of us? ...I guess we
can never be sure, but at least that's
mission accomplished! Right?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Right. But still. Like we saw with Surtr
just now...enemies are appearing
unpredictably, left and right.$k$p$EFace_Cool|And there are more now... We should
take care of them before they can
harm any of the villagers!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|All right!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pIf reality truly is being invaded by
nightmares...what will we do?$k$pWhat CAN we do?$k$p$Sbs150|
